reviewText: I ordered this movie for my grandchildren to watch in the car on a weekend trip. The four year old said she liked it.
Love this whole series.  Keeps all students engaged and learning.

This series has been in our family sine it first came out on VHS.  All our kids have enjoyed it and keep asking to play it.  They like the songs, the pictures, "Spin"'s quirky humor, and they learn something while they are at it.  What more can one ask?  My family wholeheartedly recommends it.
Compared to similar animal videos for kids this one is poor. I DO NOT RECCOMMEND IT! it is boring. It doent have any cute sing along songs.
